blog1.name: Understanding the Difference: Static Generated Sites vs. WordPress
blog1.author: Nicki Faircloth

content.p1: In the world of web development, creating a website can be achieved through various means. Two popular options are using static site generators and WordPress. Although they may seem similar at first glance, they have distinct differences that cater to different needs. Let's break down both options.
